name: Buried Love - New Year's Eve Party
name_original: Buried Love - New Year's Eve Party
description:
This is a mini-game using the characters from the Buried Love text-based interactive fiction. 

It's New Year's Eve and you've been invited to a party. The image choices you make will shape your party experience. 

Who's hosting the party? Who will you dance with? Count down to midnight with? Go home with?

Will you have a romantic evening, or a party of pure chaos? 

This mini-game is a thank you to everyone who has supported Buried Love, and a thank you for your patience. 

And most importantly - Happy New Year!
